localize.description: See what's buzzing on The Economist in your native language

localize.title: エコノミスト人気の記事
localize.description: 人気のエコノミスト記事を日本語で閲覧

blogPost.title: Madonna made music history in 2005 by releasing her single “Hung Up” as a ringtone before it was aired on the radio. But what happened to the lucrative ringtone market? @1843mag investigates https://t.co/ViypUrzEh9
blogPost.author: The Economist

localize.full_text: 2005年，麦当娜在电台播出之前就将自己的单曲《Hung Up》作为铃声发布，创造了音乐历史。但利润丰厚的铃声市场发生了什么？@1843mag调查https://t.co/ViypUrzEh9。
2005年，麥當娜在電臺播出之前就將自己的單曲《Hung Up》作爲鈴聲發佈，創造了音樂歷史。但利潤豐厚的鈴聲市場發生了什麼？@1843mag調查https://t.co/ViypUrzEh9。

previous.title: A study of 1,500 workers in 46 countries found that 85% said their well-being had declined. People are reporting neck and back pain, too  https://t.co/lO4TeaES5c

localize.full_text: 一项针对46个国家1500名工人的研究发现，85%的人表示他们的幸福感下降了。人们也在报告颈部和背部疼痛，https://t.co/lO4TeaES5c。
一項針對46個國家1500名工人的研究發現，85%的人表示他們的幸福感下降了。人們也在報告頸部和背部疼痛，https://t.co/lO4TeaES5c。

next.title: Two long sections of DNA inherited from Neanderthals appear to confer resistance or susceptibility to severe covid-19, depending on which is present https://t.co/nAcgt0NOE0

localize.full_text: 遗传自尼安德特人的两段较长的DNA似乎赋予了对严重的covid-19的抵抗力或易感性，这取决于哪一个是存在https://t.co/nAcgt0NOE0。
遺傳自尼安德特人的兩段較長的DNA似乎賦予了對嚴重的covid-19的抵抗力或易感性，這取決於哪一個是存在https://t.co/nAcgt0NOE0。
